2.name: Response Due Date
2.description: The latest date by which the additional information is to be returned to requestor.

3.name: Patient Consent
3.description: Code indicating if the Payer has obtained patient consent for release of information (1) - Optional. Refer to HL7-Table 0136 - Yes/No-Indicator for suggested values.
3.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

4.name: Date Additional Information was submitted
4.description: The date on which the information was assembled for transmission to the Payer. Not necessarily the same as the message date.
